raw_body: MAHPITIGAMA NANDA – Cherished wife of the late G.P. (Percy),​ devoted mother of the late Dushmantha and dear mother-in-law of the late Sunethra,​ adored grandmother of Priya & Madhara. Remains lie at the residence No. 21,​ Barnes Avenue,​ Mount Lavinia on Saturday the 6th from 9.00 a.m. onwards. Cortege leaves residence at 3.30 p.m. on same day for Cremation at the Mount Lavinia (Galkissa) Cemetery at 4 p.m.001953
